entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @atrupar Trump had 4 yrs to upgrade whatever pandemic response Obama left. If @POTUS had taken responsibility & done his job, instead of tweeting & golfing, that binder would have been available sooner. Instead, @realDonaldTrump & the @WhiteHouse did nothing about #COVID19 for 4 months.
